subject: Baseball
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Craig Biggio, who fell two votes short of enshrinement last year, will be joined by 17 newcomers, including Randy Johnson and Pedro Martinez, on the 2015 ballot.
snippet: Craig Biggio, who fell two votes short of enshrinement last year, will be joined by 17 newcomers, including Randy Johnson and Pedro Martinez, on the 2015 ballot.
